channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Floods every time it rains, 26th October
item.description:
Not sure if it's a blocked drain, or a lack of drainage - but everytime it rains, this section of Puddle Dock floods ... does Nominative Determinism apply to streets?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Puddle Dock, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Croydon Rd, Beckenham opp jct with Belmont Rd, another vehicle is being used as an advertisement / trading device, 25th October
item.description:
On Croydon Rd, Beckenham opp jct with Belmont Rd, another vehicle is being used as an advertisement / trading device - a small Vauxhall car Reg: HT07 JYW - with ads on the bonnet, doors a rear window. The latter rear window ad makes the car in roadworthy as it obstruct the driver rear view. This is the same street trading ad on a car as recently reported in Shortlands Rd, Shortlands. The Public Highway is being used for these cars as advertisement devices.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 319, Croydon Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken Road Surface, 25th October
item.description:
Part of the road surface outside Nos 79 and 81 Chinbrook Road has sunken in quite significantly (due to settlement) where roadworks / excavations have been carried out in the past. The section on road outside 79 & 81 Chinbrook Road is dangerous because of this and really needs resurfacing and backfilling. Please can these remedial works be carried out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chinbrook Road, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet
